articles.title: Americas now global Monkeypox epicentre, still no cases in T&T | Loop Trinidad & Tobago - Loop News Trinidad & Tobago
articles.description:
Although Trinidad and Tobago has no confirmed cases of Monkeypox, the Americas has been the epicentre of the virus since August 25. 

This was acknowledged by Chief Medical Officer Dr Roshan Parasram who was speaking at the Ministry of He

articles.content:

articles.title: American, Russians to blast off for ISS as war rages in Ukraine - Briefly
articles.description: A US astronaut and two Russian cosmonauts are set to blast off to the International Space Station Wednesday on a Russian-operated flight despite soaring tensions between Moscow and Washington over Russia's invasion of Ukraine.
articles.content:
NASA astronaut Frank Rubio (L), and Russian cosmonauts Sergey Prokopyev and Dmitri Petelin, are set to blast off to the International Space Station (ISS).
Photo: Dmitry LOVETSKY / POOL/AFPSource: AF… [+3575 chars]

articles.title: America's Sexually Transmitted Disease Problem Is 'Out of Control' - Gizmodo
articles.description: At a conference this week, public health experts and health officials sounded an alarm over growing case numbers of syphilis, gonorrhea, and chlamydia.
